page.title: 20Rogart - Health and Law
page.content:
When a fire breaks out, the Fire Brigade comes from Golspie or Lairg. If someoneis ill, the District Nurse is called. She may call in the doctor from Golspie or Lairg. In an emergency,the ambulance from Golspie will take you to hospital in Golspie or Inverness. The nearest police station is in Golspie.
This information concerning Rogart in 1985 was collected by Elizabeth Sutherland, Chris Murray, Donald Cameron, Sonni Mackay, Joan Gunn, Stephen Woods, Duncan Mackay, David Beedles, Robert Aiken, Alasdair Mackenzie, Ruairidh Cameron, Kathleen Beedles, Fiona Letters, Tracey Bremner and Anne Irving.
